name: Mom Dad Baby TTT
description:
Do you like tic-tac-toe?
Would you like mom dad and baby to play tic-tac-toe together at the same time? This is your opportunity to have hours of family fun and strategy.
Play online against other players or your friends with cross platform play!
Get immersed in the magic of this new twist of the classic tictactoe game.
Make decisions!
Choose!
Are you going to roll?
Or are you going to move?
Kick daddy?
Kick Mommy?
Kick Baby?
Make your mind and play!
It's fun!
Oh yeah, and you'll learn about circles, planes, positions, and angles as well.
We're using the tic-tac-toe winning principle of connecting three tokens in a row, as well as, an innovative five outcome dice, in a game that promotes understanding and use of angles, radii, and positions in a plane.
